newest.message:
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed a crash when an unknown skill is present in the skill queue.
== Misc ==
* Certificates Browser and notifications have been deprecated due to their removal in Rubicon expansion. * Several improvements have been done to the base code to make EVEMon a better application.
